channel.title: Recommended Source?
channel.description:
Anyone know a good source to start on my server? I know coding, but I need a source that has almost to no lag, silab items, the works.
I've tried the following,
Devolution (sucks) RicScape (fair) RichScape (items screwed up) Allstar (too lazy to make it a clean slate)

item.title: Recommended Source?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Learn and practice Java for a while, then build your own framework. You will learn a lot about the RuneScape protocol, and you can design it however the fuck you want!

Read full topic
